string.name: name
string.value: What the Green King Goblin Wants
The Guardian Spirit says the Goblins of Kamak Mountain are the only ones that know something about the Old Fox. Go see the #bGreen King Goblin#k at #bDokebi House#k near the Haunted House.

The Green King Goblin says he will tell everything about the Old Fox only if I get him #b1 plate#k of his favorite #bbuckwheat jelly#k. Let's go buy buckwheat jelly from the Folk Town. \n\n#i2022051##t2022051# #b#c2022051##k/1
The Green King Goblin revealed how to retrieve a soul from the Old Fox.
오옷! 왠 인간이 여기에! 혹시 나랑 씨름하려고 온 거야?! 씨름이라면 언제든 환영이야! 특히 달이 휘영청 밝은 밤에 하는 씨름은 최고지! 자, 그럼 빨리 시합을 해 보자고! 엥...? 씨름은 구미호랑 하라고?
뭐야? 씨름하러 온 게 아니라고? 이런이런! 씨름을 하고 싶어서 찾아온 게 분명하다고 생각했는데! 하긴... 넌 나랑 씨름하기엔 체구가 좀 작구나. 그럼 뭐하러 여기 온 건데? 뭐? 구미호에 대해 알아보러 왔으니, 아는 게 있으면 말해 달라고?
흠흠흠. 구미호라~ 알고 있는 게 있기는 하지만 씨름 상대도 안 해주는 사람한테 그냥 알려줄 수는 없지. 말랑말랑한 메밀묵을 1개만 구해다 주면 그 때 알려줄게!
에엣? 아니야? 그럼 역시 씨름하러 온 거구나! 자, 어서 씨름 한 판 하자고!

Huh?! What is a human doing here?! Have you come to challenge me in wrestling?! If that's the case, you're on! Wrestling is the best on a bright moonlit night! Okay, bring it on! What...? You want to wrestle the Old Fox?

Why not? You're not here for the wrestling? Unbelievable! I was sure you came for the wrestling! But of course... you are a bit small to be a match for me. Then why are you here? What? You're here for information on the #rOld Fox#k?
Ahem... of course I know about the Old Fox, but why would I give up information to someone who won't even wrestle with me? I'll think it over on #ba plate#k of soft #bbuckwheat jelly#k!
What? Not interested? Then, you really are here for the wrestling! Come on, let's get it on!
Oh my~ this is the most delicious looking buckwheat jelly I've ever seen! So soft, yet so firm! Okay, I've decided to let you in on the Old Fox.
The Old Fox tends to collect human souls. Why? It's said that an Old Fox can become human after collecting 1000 human souls. Not sure if it is true, myself! Old Foxes do, though.
You want to know how humans with their soul stolen become? Well... they become soulless dolls! They cannot be cured! It isn't an illness, and they are missing their souls. Of course...

Get #rone of the nine tails of an Old Fox#k and try tickling the nose of the victim with it. The soul will come back after the victim sniffles! However, you'll have to defeat an Old Fox first, and I know for sure that it won't be easy! I've done my part of the bargain of buckwheat jelly, haven't I?
What! No #bplate of buckwheat jelly#k? I want my buckwheat jelly~
